title: Project SAM - Concert Harp EXP [KONTAKT]
description:
Torrent Info:
==============

This is not my own torrent!


Torrent Contents:
==================

Kontakt Library


Installation:
==============

Add the root folder of this torrent as a Kontakt library. Use a cracked version of Kontakt ;)


Product Info:
==============

This library features a beautifully sampled concert harp, recorded in a concert hall environment. A variety of single note playing techniques and beautifully performed glissando scales and effects were sampled.

Concert Harp offers the following banks and playing techniques.

Single notes:

- Single notes (4 dynamics, 2 alternations)
- Flagolets
- Pres de la table
- Sons xylo
- Paper notes (pieces of paper stuck between the strings)

Glissando scales:

- Major
- Minor
- Diminished
- Whole-tone
- Octatonic (new in Concert Harp EXP!)
- Pentatonic in F (new in Concert Harp EXP!)
- Bb sus4 (new in Concert Harp EXP!)

Pitch bend effects.

The sampled single note harp range is C0 - G6 with C3 being middle C.

Glissando scales are performed upwards, downwards and up-downwards in various speeds and dynamics.

TECH SPECS:

- Kontakt 4 format. Compatible with Kontakt Player 4
- Dedicated interface with scripted features
- 1.3 GB library size (compressed NCW format)
- 2 stereo mic positions
